channel.title: Pickup command

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @jman11208 jman11208
item.description:
@jman11208 wrote:

OK dude here it is add this to ur commands i just got it it works and im using funscape just add to ur regular commands

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 7500 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 100”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @Linkel Linkel
item.description:
@Linkel wrote:

VB7 I still can’t get it working.

But off-topic from this question, can you help me get my server online?

I disconnected my router because I couldn’t be bothered anymore with port forwarding, and changed to my normal modem.

I’ve got No-IP DUC running and I opened the ports on windows firewall… but still people can’t get to my server.

Any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Linkel, post:7, topic:139386”]That’s what I got atm.

Can you copy and paste that into a post and add what you think needs adding please? That would help a lot.

else if ((command.startsWith(“pickup”)) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

Thanks.[/quote]

You’re missing a } at the end.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

else if (b[/b] && (playerRights >= 2))

If you’re any sort of decent admin your playerRights should already be > 2, so no need for a name check.

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @Linkel Linkel
item.description:
@Linkel wrote:

Sorry this is probably a REALLY nooby question for all you guys as everyone has the pickup command on their server… but mine isn’t working.

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ash”) || playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

There’s what I got, what’s wrong with it?
And yes, my player name is Ash.

Read full topic
